trans:
Contest üéµ
Men and women walk in a circle in pairs
Holding hands and saying
I will never forget you!
I will find you wherever you are!
And I will do with you what the host says!
I love you!
Girls, remember your partner, let go of your hands, and form a circle with just the girls, holding hands again. Guys, this might not be your thing, but you need to form an outer circle and also hold hands around the girls. Girls, you need to move from left to right to the music, guys as usual from right to left, all of this you will do to the music! As soon as the music stops, I will give you a task, for example: hand to hand, you will need to find your partner and stand hand to hand with them. It doesn't matter whose ear or nose, the main thing is to do it with your partner!
The pair that completes the task last will be eliminated. Girls to the right, guys to the left to the music! Let's go!
Back to back
Head on waist (waist only for girls)
Girls on the shoulders of men
Knee to butt
Heel to the back of the head
Armpit near the armpit
